content:
The PCB was discovered by air intelligence officers of the 1st Separate Battalion of the Marines on the occupied left bank of the Dnieper.

About thisreported March 27The Navy of the Armed Forces.

Air Intelligence revealed the location and confirmed the fact of hostile Russian PCB in the temporarily occupied territory of the Left Bank of Ukraine.

Asreported the armyinform, the Ukrainian military destroyed in the south a couple of enemy BUK and MUR-M complex.
title: Defense forces impressed the enemy command-observer
description: This was reported on March 27 by the Navy. Air Intelligence has discovered ...
author: Army Inform
